name: settings-extension
description: A comprehensive Manifest V3 browser extension framework for robust settings management across Chrome and Firefox browsers

scripts.test:e2e: npm run clean:test-data && npm run build && playwright test --project=chromium test/e2e/extension-functionality.test.js test/e2e/popup-button-functionality.test.js test/e2e/user-workflows.test.js test/e2e/storage-advanced.test.js test/e2e/popup-decoupled-functionality.test.js
scripts.test:e2e:chrome: npm run clean:test-data && npm run build && playwright test --project=chromium test/e2e/extension-functionality.test.js test/e2e/popup-button-functionality.test.js test/e2e/user-workflows.test.js test/e2e/storage-advanced.test.js test/e2e/popup-decoupled-functionality.test.js
scripts.test:e2e:firefox: npm run build && TEST_FIREFOX=true playwright test test/e2e/firefox-functional.test.js
scripts.test:e2e:firefox-poc: npm run build && TEST_FIREFOX=true playwright test test/e2e/firefox-extension-proof-of-concept.test.js
scripts.test:e2e:firefox-functional: npm run build && TEST_FIREFOX=true playwright test test/e2e/firefox-functional.test.js
scripts.test:e2e:all: npm run test:e2e:chrome && npm run test:e2e:firefox
scripts.test:e2e:ui: npm run clean:test-data && npm run build && playwright test --ui --project=chromium test/e2e/extension-functionality.test.js test/e2e/popup-button-functionality.test.js test/e2e/user-workflows.test.js test/e2e/storage-advanced.test.js test/e2e/popup-decoupled-functionality.test.js
scripts.test:all: npm run test:chrome && npm run test:firefox
scripts.dist: npm run build && npm run package:chrome && npm run package:firefox
scripts.package:firefox: npm run build && cp dist/manifest.firefox.json dist/manifest.json && web-ext build --source-dir=dist --filename=settings-extension-firefox.xpi --overwrite-dest

author: Settings Extension Team
